sentences.english: In addition acupuncture and auriculotherapy also have better treatment effect to nocturnal make water.
sentences.chinese: 此外针灸和耳针疗法对夜尿也有较好治疗作用。

sentences.english: It is a new method for treating the disease with the ear acupuncture.
sentences.chinese: 用耳针治这种病，是一种新方法。

sentences.english: All the "ear-needle"(ear-ring's wearing part) of alloy products, have gone through a professional prevent hypersusceptibility process.
sentences.chinese: 所有合金产品耳针都经过专业仿过敏处理。

sentences.english: Know about the development of auricular acupuncture therapy.
sentences.chinese: 了解耳针的近代研究概况。

sentences.english: The matters need attention of auricular acupunture.

definition: acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
suction cup (used in Chinese medicine to draw the blood and qi 氣|气)/detachable suction chimney to make a stove draw
